Package controller

Class ModifyAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyAppointmentController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Thoai Tran
This is the Modify Appointment Controller Class. This class handles the mechanics to load user input into the SQL DB To update an existing appointment.

    • startTimeComboBox

      void startTimeComboBox​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This is the Start Time Combo Box. This loads the combo box with a list of times to choose from. Times are set from 08:00 to 22:00 Eastern Time. These are the hours of business. It is impossible for user to select and time outside of business Time.
      Parameters:
      event - event.

    • endDateDatePicker

      void endDateDatePicker​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This is the End Date Picker.
      Parameters:
      event - event.

    • endTimeComboBox

      void endTimeComboBox​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This is the End Time Combo Box. This loads the combo box with times to choose. Times are set from 08:00 to 22:00 Eastern Time. These are the hours of business. It is impossible for user to select and time outside of business Time.
      Parameters:
      event - event.

    • saveButton

      void saveButton​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the Save Button. This methods loads the user input into the SQL DB. Validates Input and sets the time as Eastern time to be then converted to UTC time.
      Parameters:
      event - event.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • cancelButton

      void cancelButton​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the Cancel Button. This brings the user back to the Appointment Overview page.
      Parameters:
      event - event.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • overlapCheck

      private boolean overlapCheck​(java.time.ZonedDateTime newStart, java.time.ZonedDateTime newEnd) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method handles the Input Validation for appointments regarding scheduled Overlaps. Grabs the user textfield that the user input has made and checks to see if new appointment requests conflict with that users current schedule.
      Parameters:
      newStart - start time request
      newEnd - end time request.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
